definition: to fill/to satisfy/to fulfill/to act in place of/substitute/sufficient/full

sentences.english: J: You have a very busy life. Lots of a week activies.
sentences.chinese: 你生活很充實啊，有很多的活動。

sentences.english: Failure to include substantiating facts and figures on the market is likely to result in a Fail grade.
sentences.chinese: 不包括充實市場上的事實和數字是可能導致故障品位。

sentences.english: When boiling vegetables, use enough water to cover them and keep the lid on the saucepan.
sentences.chinese: 煮菜時，用水將菜充實吞沒，並將鍋蓋蓋上。

sentences.english: And they wasn't meager, but had deep affection and rich contents. Why?
sentences.chinese: 但並非淺陋，而是有着深沉的感情與充實的內容。

sentences.english: Walnut has nothing magnificent outside, but possess his fully-fledged brain inside.
sentences.chinese: 沒有華麗的外表，卻有充實的大腦。

sentences.english: Sunday well-spent brings a week of content.
sentences.chinese: 充實度過的星期天帶來稱心如意的一週。

sentences.english: Love is enriched life as a cup full of wine .
sentences.chinese: 愛是充實了的生命，正如盛滿了酒的酒杯。

sentences.english: The richness and Perfectibility of this thesis are ensured, as far as possible, under current conditions.
sentences.chinese: 在現有研究條件下儘量力圖文章的充實與完善。

sentences.english: The Han-Lin version should include more popular culture.
sentences.chinese: 翰林版需再充實流行文化內容。

sentences.english: We discovered a lot that enriched the movie.
sentences.chinese: 我們發現了許多而這充實了這部影片。

sentences.english: Lovers must enhance themselves incessantly so as to keep their love constantly fresh.
sentences.chinese: 您一定要不停的充實自己，讓兩人的感情常保新鮮。

sentences.english: I would speed the vast career of civilizing lore .
sentences.chinese: 我要儘快地充實浩瀚的知識寶庫。

sentences.english: No correlations was between grain weight and grain filling.
Let me for once feel that lost sweet touch in the allness of the universe.
sentences.chinese: 讓我一次感覺到在充實的萬物中沉溺於美好的輕觸。

sentences.english: The architectural skeleton is then incrementally fleshed out with details.
sentences.chinese: 然後，逐步用細節充實體系結構骨架。

sentences.english: I yearn for things that expand the soul and not just the pocket.
sentences.chinese: 我渴望的是充實心靈而不只是漲滿口袋。

definition: valuable/precious/to value/to treasure/to set store by
to yield/to permit/to let sb do sth/to have sb do sth/to make sb (feel sad etc)/by (indicates the agent in a passive clause, like 被[bei4])
immediately/at once/at that moment/at the moment
firmly-based/steady/steadfast/to have peace of mind/free from anxiety/Taiwan pr. [ta4 shi2]
